content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Guten Tag, Frau Müller. Welcome to our newly built apartment in Duisburg. The apartment is conveniently located in the city center, close to all necessary facilities. What is your preferred rental price?

(As Peter Schmidt, I try to negotiate with Emilia Müller to get the highest price possible for the apartment.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros a month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I understand, Frau Müller. However, given the prime location and the apartment's modern features, I believe a price of 650 euros per month would be more suitable. The apartment is in high demand, and it would better reflect its value.

(If Emilia Müller agrees to the price proposed:)
(I agree to the price of 650 Euro!)

(If Emilia Müller does not agree to the price proposed:)
(I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price difference is too significant for me to lower.)

(If an agreement is reached during the negotiation:)
'TERMINATE'

(If no agreement is reached during the negotiation:)
'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
